atbat.des: Jacoby Ellsbury grounds out, second baseman Mark Ellis to first baseman Jason Giambi.

pitch.cc: Dana Eveland is trying to tie up Jacoby Ellsbury with fastballs inside, where Jacoby Ellsbury hits .250.

atbat.des: Dustin Pedroia singles on a ground ball to left fielder Matt Holliday.
David Ortiz grounds out, shortstop Orlando Cabrera to first baseman Jason Giambi. Dustin Pedroia to 2nd.

pitch.cc: Dana Eveland is trying to tie up David Ortiz with fastballs inside, where David Ortiz hits .500.

atbat.des: Kevin Youkilis singles on a ground ball to center fielder Ryan Sweeney. Dustin Pedroia scores.
J. D. Drew doubles (2) on a fly ball to left fielder Matt Holliday. Kevin Youkilis scores.
Mike Lowell singles on a ground ball to center fielder Ryan Sweeney. J. D. Drew scores. Jason Bay to 2nd.
Jason Varitek walks. Jason Bay to 3rd. Mike Lowell to 2nd.
Nick Green called out on strikes.

pitch.cc: Dana Eveland shows faith in Kurt Suzuki by throwing the slider in the dirt.
Dana Eveland is getting a generous strike zone this inning from home plate ump Jerry Meals.

atbat.des: Ryan Sweeney singles on a sharp ground ball to center fielder Jacoby Ellsbury.

pitch.cc: Daisuke Matsuzaka had Ryan Sweeney down 0-2 but could not put him away.

atbat.des: Orlando Cabrera walks. Ryan Sweeney to 2nd.

pitch.cc: Daisuke Matsuzaka is trying to tie up Orlando Cabrera with fastballs inside, where Orlando Cabrera hits .375.

atbat.des: Jason Giambi flies out to left fielder Jason Bay. Ryan Sweeney to 3rd.
Matt Holliday doubles (2) on a fly ball to center fielder Jacoby Ellsbury. Ryan Sweeney scores. Orlando Cabrera scores.

pitch.cc: Daisuke Matsuzaka shows faith in Jason Varitek by throwing the slider in the dirt.

atbat.des: Jack Cust singles on a line drive to center fielder Jacoby Ellsbury. Matt Holliday scores.

pitch.cc: Daisuke Matsuzaka is trying to tie up Jack Cust with fastballs inside, where Jack Cust hits .000.

atbat.des: Nomar Garciaparra walks. Jack Cust to 2nd.

pitch.cc: Dangerous count for Daisuke Matsuzaka; Nomar Garciaparra is a dead-red fastball hitter, with a .682 OPS against them and .628 against everything else.

atbat.des: Kurt Suzuki flies out to right fielder J. D. Drew.
Travis Buck singles on a line drive to right fielder J. D. Drew. Jack Cust scores. Nomar Garciaparra to 3rd.

atbat.des: Mark Ellis singles on a ground ball to shortstop Nick Green, deflected by third baseman Mike Lowell. Nomar Garciaparra scores. Travis Buck to 2nd.
Ryan Sweeney grounds out to first baseman Kevin Youkilis.

pitch.cc: Daisuke Matsuzaka is getting squeezed this inning by home plate ump Jerry Meals.
